DOC.brief_summary: Urinary incontinence major health issue woman . It estimate affect 30 - 40 % old woman . Stress urinary incontinence , common form disease , treat primarily surgery . A woman 's lifetime risk surgery SUI 4 % , nearly 1/3 surgery perform recurrence . Many different surgical procedure describe treatment SUI general agreement effective . This study compare safety efficacy tension-free vaginal tape procedure Monarc subfascial hammock procedure treatment stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Tension-free Vaginal Tape With Monarc Procedure Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Urinary incontinence symptom Urodynamic stress incontinence confirm multichannel urodynamic test Age least 21 year Desires surgical correction stress urinary incontinence Postvoid residual volume > 100cc Detrusor overactivity preoperative multichannel urodynamic test History previous synthetic , biologic fascial suburethral sling Desires future childbearing Chronic inguinal vulvar abscess history Hidradenitis Suppurativa History bleed diathesis current anticoagulation therapy Inguinal lymphadenopathy inguinal/vulvar mass Current genitourinary fistula urethral diverticulum Reversible cause incontinence ( i.e . drug effect ) Contraindication surgery
